scenario_text.value:
Sup, guys. As you can see, we’ve come up
empty on the shrine search.

Kaitooo! What’re you dilly-dallying for?!
We’re looking here next!
I know, hold your horses!

Her Majesty here’s been working me to the
bone this whole time.

I feel kinda bad for the guy... Think we
should help him out?

Hmm, you think? Kaito doesn’t really seem to
mind...
(What should I do?)
Let’s help.
Let’s stay out of it.

I guess we should help? It looks like Kaito’s
being overwhelmed here.
You got that right.
Hey, knock it off, you two...
Yo, we’ll help out, too!
Really?! Awesome, thanks a bunch you guys!
All right, you, listen and listen good!

Heheheh, now I don’t even need to lift
a finger...
Oh boy... And here I was trying to spare you.

Man, she pulled the wool over our eyes! She’s
good, real good...

Uh, sorry, Miu, we have other places to be.
We’ll swing back around when we can...

Bah! Fine, then you’d better help out next
time.

Kaito seems to be handling it well enough.
Maybe we aren’t needed here?

Yeah, I’m more than enough for the job. You
guys check out another spot.

You sure? Going along with her whims is just
gonna wear you down.

Hey moron, how many years you think I’ve been
doing this older brother thing?
I’m used to indulging her, believe me.
Earth to Kaito! Get over here, already!
Yeah, I’m coming!
Get it? Don’t you worry about me.

He almost seems happy to be ordered around by
her. Weird guy...

Hey, watch your mouth! That’s...probably not
the case...
Oh yeah, Kaito. Didn’t you spot Haru before?
That’s right. He was walking in the woods.
He was here?! What happened?!
I called out to him and he bolted.

I wasn’t nearby at the time, so I didn’t know
about it. Weird though, right?

Yeah, he seemed...pissed off somehow. Ain’t
never seen the kid look like that.
Pissed off? What was Haru mad about?

Who knows? That’s how I saw it, but maybe I’m
imagining things.

Still, could’ve been a Kenzoku in disguise.
Watch your step if you run into him.
Yeah, right.
Oh, back to help, are you?

Get the heck outta here, Takuma, before you
end up in my position.
